content: increase cast on 7 sts k12 increase 7 cast on sts skpo k1 k2 decrease k to end rs facing rejoin yarns c & d off-white 4-ply and boucle cast on 5 sts 20sts k10 increase your cast on sts cast off last 4 sts cut yarn row 10 increase cast on 7 sts p to end 27sts row 11 increase kfb k to last st kfb 29sts pm at each end last row from right ear front marker ws facing rejoin yarns b & c beige and off-white 4-ply and with row 12 & 14 p smaller needles work on 10sts for right ear as foll row 13 increase kfb k to last st kfb 31sts row 1 p back row 2-13 cont as left ear from * to ** row 15 decrease k13 skpo k1 k2 decrease k to end 29sts cut yarn thread end through all 5 sts pull up to close up the sts and row 16 18 & 20 p secure the end row 17 decrease k12 skpo k1 k2 decrease k to end 27sts row 19 decrease k11 skpo k1 k2 decrease k to end 25sts row 21 increase kfb k to last st kfb 27sts row 22 p lamb page 3 lamb page 7 row 23-26 increase repeat last 2 row twice 31sts pm at each end last p row 35 decrease k16 skpo k1 k2 decrease k to end 35sts row for hind leg marker row 37 decrease k13 skpo k5 k2 decrease turn so p-side facing to work on tail row 27 increase k12 kfb k5 kfb k to end 33sts sts as foll tail row 28 30 p row 1 p7 turn so k-side facing for tail sts haunches row 2-5 work 6 row st st on just 7 tail sts row 29 increase k13 kfb k5 kfb k to end 35sts cast off all 7 tail sts leaving enough yarn to sew the tail seam with row 31 increase k14 kfb k5 kfb k to end 37sts … work short row to shape the haunches rs facing return to 13sts for lamb s right back side rejoin yarns c & d short row 1 p36 take yarn to the back of the work slip next st purl- off-white 4-ply and boucle and with 3 75mm/ size 4 larger needles cont wise onto the rh needle bring working yarn to the front slip the as foll slipped stitch back onto the lh needle turn the knitting = w+tp row 37 k13 wrap and turn purl row 38 p across lamb s right back then left back so all 26 sts working short row 2 k35 bring yarn to the front of the work slip next st under the tail purl-wise onto the rh needle take working yarn to the back slip the row 39 decrease k10 skpo k2 k2 decrease k to end 24sts pull gauge tight as slipped stitch back onto the lh needle turn the knitting = w+tk
